Summary: bright white light appeared in air then disappeared straight down never hit the ground
divs: Sighting DetailsAs my brother and me driving home from the laundry mat place, we took back roads to get home faster had factories buildings around and houses couple. Driving south after two curb turns all of a sudden this BRIGHT WHITE LIGHT APPEARED FROM THE SKY AIR STRAIGHT DOWN CURBBED A LITTLE BIT BUT IT NEVER HIT THE GROUND IT JUST DISAPPEARED RIGHT INFRONT OF US LIKE 10FT AHEAD. I WAS LOOKING UP STILL MY BROTHER DRIVING I DIDNT SEE NOTHING AT ALL. Got home looked up in our driveway the moon was out and stars around the little dipper was out overcast it was that night around this time it happened. But it was on a sunday night though. Nothing like that never happens to me or my brother. That was the first. Plus it was way to cold for fireflies to be out. Here last night was sunday night was 56degrees. Cold. No bugs like that i know will do that.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Kankakee
There were no other sightings in Kankakee on or around November 4th 2012
